4 Workflow: basics Practice Why does this code not work? my_variable <- 10 my_varıable ## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'my_varıable' not found Look carefully! (This may seem like an exercise in pointlessness, but training your brain to notice even the tiniest difference will pay off when programming.) not my_var ı able, instead is my_var i able.
